name: 否定する(Deny)
description:
this is a small prototype game where your bullets are fired right back at you, made for the 2 button jam, with music by RoccoW

unfortunately the html version wouldn't load properly, so no web build :(

Ideas and feedback are encouraged!

Controls - 

there are only 2 controls for this game, left and right.

hold left    - move left

hold right - move right

release      - shoot
